SELECT r.review_id, r.content, r.rating, r.like_count, r.dislike_count, r.is_selected, r.created_at, p.prd_name, p.prd_brand, p.category, p.product_id, u.nickname, b.type as user_baumann_type, ri.image_url FROM review r LEFT JOIN review_images ri ON ri.review_id = r.review_id AND ri.review_image_id = ( SELECT MIN(review_image_id) FROM review_images WHERE review_id = r.review_id ) JOIN product p ON r.product_id = p.product_id JOIN user_table u ON r.user_id = u.user_id JOIN baumann b ON u.baumann_id = b.baumann_id WHERE ( r.content LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR u.nickname LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' ) AND r.deleted_at IS NULL
AND p.prd_brand = #{filter_brand}
AND p.category = #{filter_category}
ORDER BY r.created_at DESC
ORDER BY r.created_at ASC
ORDER BY r.rating DESC
ORDER BY r.rating ASC
order by r.like_count DESC
ORDER BY r.created_at DESC
